name: Textra Emoji - Android Latest Style
description: This is an *add-on* to the Textra SMS application that utilizes the latest Android styled emojis.   Provides 3000+ of the latest (Unicode 12.1) emojis including diversity (skin tone) on any Android phone.  You access the emojis using the + icon to the left of the message field in the conversation. Long hold on a human skin emoji (for example a hand gesture) to see diversity (skin tone color) options.  IMPORTANT: These emoji are ONLY available in the Textra SMS app. They are not available system wide (e.g. your keyboard app).   Licensed under Apache 2.0 @ https://github.com/googlei18n/noto-emoji/blob/master/LICENSE
